_id.description: must be an objectId and is required

batchNumber.description: batch number of the WheelStack, we can't have wheels with different batchNumbers inside the one Wheelstack

type.description: Currently used placement type for the `wheelstack`

placementId.description: objectId of the placement (we can have multiple `grid`s `basePlatform`s with the same `preset`), or `storage`

rowPlacement.description: must be a string and is required

colPlacement.description: must be a string and is required

createdAt.description: must be a date and is required

lastChange.description: must be a date and is required

lastOrder.description: `objectId` of the placed order, of `null` if no orders were ever placed

maxSize.description: must be an integer and is required

blocked.description: must be a boolean and is required

items.description: must be an `objectId`s of the placed `wheel`s

wheels.description: must be an array of `objectIds` of the placed `wheel`s and is required

status.description: must be a string and is required
